title: Prabowo Subianto - Wikipedia
snippet: On 21 September 2025, Prabowo signed a presidential decree that officially made Nusantara as the political capital city of Indonesia and targeted for its realization to be implemented in 2028. However, this decree was met with suspicion as the decree only mandated for the House of Representatives ...

title: Joint Statement on the Visit of H.E. Prabowo Subianto, President of the Republic of Indonesia, to Pakistan (8-9 December 2025)
snippet: Prabowo Subianto, President of the Republic of Indonesia, paid an official visit to Pakistan on 8-9 December 2025. During the visit, President Prabowo Subianto held delegation level talks with Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and met with H.E.

title: Indonesia president expects flood-stricken Sumatra to return to normal in 2-3 months as death toll exceeds 1,000 | Reuters
snippet: REUTERS/Willy Kurniawan/File Photo ... Prabowo Subianto said on Monday that activities in areas on Sumatra that were hit by deadly floods may return to normal in the next two to three months, after a disaster that claimed more than ...

title: Curtain Raiser: Visit of the President of the Republic of Indonesia, H.E. Prabowo Subianto, to Pakistan (8-9 December 2025)
snippet: At the invitation of the Prime Minister of Pakistan, H.E. Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif, the President of the Republic of Indonesia, H.E. Prabowo Subianto, will undertake an official visit to Islamabad from 8-9 December 2025.

title: President Prabowo Says Indonesia is Strong in Handling the Sumatra Disaster
snippet: In his speech at the Plenary Cabinet Meeting at the State Palace in Jakarta, Monday (15/12/2025), the President stated that his aides have acted appropriately and swiftly in addressing the disaster.
